!Warehouse Freightman Romp: As I told you before, defeat the *Glow Wisp, Marsh Predator, Hames Orc Sniper, Cursed Guardian, Hames Orc Overlord, Wretched Archer, Grace Lich, Grave Predator, Crimson Drake, Kadios, Fallen Orc Shaman, Sharp Talon Tiger, Past Knight, Hungered Corpse, Bloody Lord, Bloody Ghost, Dark Guard, Death Agent, Spiteful Soul Leader, Spiteful Soul Wizard, Giant's Shadow, Past Creature, Warrior of Ancient Times and Soldier of Ancient Times* and bring back the Infernium Ores they stole. *I will give you a chance to play a bingo game for every 100 Infernium Ores you bring.* Of course, since the honor of our guild depends on it, you will also be well-rewarded if you do well in the bingo game. We will give you one of the necessary ingredients to manufacture an A-Grade weapon. How about it? Interested? Then hurry up!
